Flub.Name: Method
Flub.Description: The method through which details are extracted from the terrain.

Flub.Name: High Frequency
Flub.Description: Separate specific high frequencies, so sharp and smaller protruding shapes are isolated.

Flub.Name: Synthetic Details
Flub.Description: Extract specific frequencies from the terrain and generate very shape-specific details for each portion of the terrain based on local attributes.
